summary.span: 添加指定类型的资源，通过字符串值表示。

span.span: Adds a resource of the specified type represented by a string value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类型是基元类型, 则将使用由编写器将该值转换为该基元类型, 并以二进制格式存储在资源中。If the type is a primitive type, the value will be converted using by the writer to that primitive type and stored in the resources in binary format. 如果该类型不是基元类型, 则字符串值将以字符串的形式存储在资源中, 并在读取资源时使用类型为转换。If the type is not a primitive type, the string value will be stored in the resources as a string and converted with a for the type when reading the resource. 此转换可避免在资源写入过程中激活任意类型。This conversion is done to avoid activating arbitrary types during resource writing.

Public Sub Generate ()
public: virtual void Generate();

summary.span: 将所有资源写入输出流。

span.span: Writes all resources to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果添加到编写器的资源可以使用所理解的系统默认格式表示, 则它们将被写入。If the resources added to the writer can be represented in the system default format understood by the , they will be written as such. 如果资源需要运行时反序列化, 而不是系统默认格式支持的 (), 则我们将使用理解的格式编写它们。If the resources require runtime deserialization other than that supported by the system default format () then we will write them using the format understood by . 如果对象序列化期间或 IO 期间发生异常, 则将关闭并删除 .resources 文件, 因为该文件很可能无效。If an exception occurs during object serialization or during IO, the .resources file is closed and deleted, since it is most likely invalid.

span.span: The resource list is .
